worlds.name: Backend Development Lab
worlds.description: Master server-side development, APIs, and system architecture

npcs.name: Alex Debug
dialogue: Welcome to the Backend Lab! I'm Alex, and I'll guide you through server-side development.
Remember: good APIs are like good conversations - clear, consistent, and helpful.
Every bug is a learning opportunity. Let's dive deep into the code!

worlds.name: Frontend Design Studio
worlds.description: Create beautiful, responsive user interfaces and experiences

npcs.name: Maya Pixel
dialogue: Hey there! I'm Maya, your guide to frontend development and design.
Great interfaces tell a story - let's learn to craft compelling user experiences.
Remember: users don't care about your code, they care about how it makes them feel.

worlds.name: Data Science Laboratory
worlds.description: Unlock insights from data with machine learning and analytics

npcs.name: Dr. Ana Lytics
dialogue: Greetings! I'm Dr. Lytics, and I'm excited to explore data science with you.
Data is like a treasure map - we just need to learn how to read it properly.
Every dataset has a story to tell. Let's uncover some amazing insights together!
